targets.query: rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"virus" AND data.eventtype:"0-day-malware-stream"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"virus" AND data.eventtype:"infected"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"virus" AND data.eventtype:"malware-list"

rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"virus" AND NOT data.eventtype:"0-day-malware-stream" OR NOT data.eventtype:"infected" OR NOT data.eventtype:"malware-list"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Pornography"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Gambling"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Phishing" OR data.catdesc:"Spam URLs"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Crypto Mining"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Extremist Groups"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND data.catdesc:"Games"

rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"webfilter" AND NOT data.catdesc:("Pornography" OR "Other Adult Materials" OR "Child Sexual Abuse" OR "Nudity and Risque" OR "Sex Education" OR "Gambling" OR "Phishing" OR "Spam URLs" OR "Crypto Mining" OR "Extremist Groups" OR "Games" OR "Games")
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"app-ctrl" AND data.appcat:"Game"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"app-ctrl" AND data.appcat:"P2P"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"app-ctrl" AND data.appcat:"Proxy"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"app-ctrl" AND NOT data.appcat:("Game" OR "P2P" OR "Proxy")
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-address-list"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-custom-signature"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-http-constraint"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-http-method"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-signature"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"waf" AND data.eventtype:"waf-url-access"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"ips" AND data.eventtype:"botnet"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"ips" AND data.eventtype:"malicious-url"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"ips" AND data.eventtype:"signature"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.kind:"anomaly" AND data.eventtype:"anomaly"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.action: "accept"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND data.action: "deny"
rule.groups:"fwfortigate" AND data.devname:$devname AND data.srcip:$srcip AND rule.level: [6 TO *]
